name: Showers Pass Crosspoint Waterproof Knit Wool Gloves - Unisex
description: Keep your fingers warm and dry during your rainy commute. The waterproof-breathable membrane ensures your hands won't get soaked, and the merino-blend inner liner keeps you warm and sweat-free.Outer fabric is wear-resistant nylon knit with a bonded Artex waterproof-breathable membrane.Moisture-wicking merino blend liner keeps hands warm and dry.Silicone print on palm keeps grip even in wet conditions.Low-profile fit and an ergonomic fit for finger dexterity.As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of  their goods and services.
